alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Bibb; Jones; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 7:47PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Baldwin, Wilkinson, northeastern Bibb, northern Twiggs and southeastern Jones Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 747 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cross Keys to Gordon to near Scottsboro, and moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Macon, Milledgeville, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Gordon, Ivey, McIntyre, Toomsboro, Postell, Coopers, Mountain Springs, Griswoldville, Pancras, Fitzpatrick, Nicklesville, Scottsboro, Ripley, Huber, Cross Keys and Dry Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for central and east central Georgia.
